title: STK has multiple US locations across various states
statement: STK operates restaurants in Arizona, California, Colorado, D.C., Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Massachusetts, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, Puerto Rico, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, and Washington.

citations.quote: Arizona Scottsdale California Los Angeles San Diego San Francisco... Florida Aventura Orlando South Beach... New York NYC – Downtown NYC – Rooftop NYC – Midtown
